metadata.Title: CVE-2018-11832 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: In all android releases (Android for MSM, Firefox OS for MSM, QRD Android) from CAF using the linux kernel, lack of input size validation before copying to buffer in PMIC function can lead to heap overflow.

notes.Note: sbeattie> issue is in debugfs implementation in regulator/core.c, which is not upstream or in Ubuntu kernels

criterions.comment: linux-flo: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'abandoned').
linux-gke: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-goldfish: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of life').
linux-mako: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'abandoned').
